OOC: Thanks.  And thanks for taking Neody.

::Magmatron::
       He thinks =
for a moment.  "We're going to go ahead with securing that 
second base in =
Syria.  The Trainers have been eliminated.  That leaves the 
Predacons."  H=
e opens another com.  "All Destrons report to the Sulaco ASAP." 
 He return=
s to Halucigen.  "Our numbers seem to have dwindled recently.  I 
suspect t=
raitors.  This means we shall have to rely on others to help us."  
He brin=
gs up a map and points to the new Maximal City.  "There is a battle 
there =
right now.  If we help the Maximals, we will be in a position to 
extract t=
heir assistance.  I will also send a communiqu=E9 to Zardus.  (He 
doesn't =
know Zardus left.)  Between the Maximals and the Alliance we will 
crush th=
e Predacons in their own base."

--part1_132.33047ff.28ff959e_boundary
